# DevMentorAI

> DevMentorAI is a Chrome/Firefox browser extension powered by GitHub Copilot CLI that provides AI-powered DevOps mentoring, writing assistance, and development help directly in your browser. It captures page context (DOM, errors, network logs) and works on authenticated/private pages with a privacy-first local architecture.

- Backend installable via: `npx devmentorai-server`
- Extension available for Chrome and Firefox on [GitHub Releases](https://github.com/BOTOOM/devmentorai/releases)
- Powered by GitHub Copilot SDK (local CLI, no cloud storage)
- MIT Licensed open source project

## Features

- [Session Types]: DevOps Mentor, Writing Assistant, Development Helper, General Assistant
- [DevOps Tools]: Config analysis (Kubernetes, Docker, Terraform, CloudFormation, GitHub Actions), error diagnosis, sandboxed file reading
- [Context Awareness]: DOM structure, console logs, network errors, code blocks, tables, platform detection (AWS, Azure, GCP, GitHub, GitLab, Kubernetes, Datadog, Grafana, Jenkins)
- [Privacy]: Local-only processing on localhost:3847, no credential storage, automatic PII redaction (tokens, API keys, passwords), file system sandbox
- [Image Support]: Screenshot capture, clipboard paste, drag & drop, lightbox viewer, up to 5 images per message
- [UX]: Side panel chat, floating bubble, selection toolbar, multi-session, SSE streaming, keyboard shortcuts, i18n (English/Spanish)
- [Communication]: HTTP/SSE adapter + optional Chrome Native Messaging for enhanced security
